document: <sentence id="s2" text="Of the genes detected out, gap junction assembly gene mutation was with significant difference (χ2 = 75.132, p = 0.000) between audio-no-pass group (417/1315, 31.711%) and random-selected cohort (159/1000, 15.900%); c.109G AAAA A was the most common allele, as well as the only one with significantly different allele frequency (χ2 = 79.327, p = 0.000) between audio-no-pass group (392/1315, 16.84%) and random-selected cohort (140/1000, 7.55%), which suggested c.109G AAAA A mutation was critical for newborns' hearing loss.">
